DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine intrapartum use glucose-containing solution improve outcome pregnant woman baby .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Intravenous Fluids During Labor
DOC.detailed_description: This multi-center , prospective , single-blind randomize trial two type IV fluid maintenance hydration labor . This study conduct 4 site : Reading ( Reading Hospital ) , Allentown ( Lehigh Valley ) , St. Luke Hospital Hershey ( Penn State College Medicine ) . It include 1524 pregnant woman ≥ 36 week present spontaneous labor anticipate delivery . The primary research hypothesis intravenous hydration labor glucose-containing fluid lead efficient uterine contractility lead reduction cesarean delivery . The primary outcome measure occurrence cesarean birth study period . The primary analysis use intent-to-treat approach examine difference two IV fluid treatment proportion delivery require cesarean section .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age singleton gestation spontaneous labor great equal 36 week without contraindication participation . 2 . These woman good health candidate vaginal delivery . 1 . Patients candidate vaginal delivery . This may due fetal malpresentation , prior cesarean section , multiple gestation , etc . 2 . Patients present induction labor require induction upon admission . 3 . Patients present scheduled cesarean section . 4 . Patients form diabetes glucose dysregulation condition . 5 . Concurrent use steroid . 6 . Patients present active labor advance cervical dilation ( ≥ 6 cm ) . 7 . Subjects participate another labor delivery related clinical trial conflict trial ( determine site PI ) .
